snippet.title: Broken Silence - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Fates intertwine when university student Marina and police officer Carl find themselves both kidnapped by the notorious "Phantom" killer. Take the role of either character, solve puzzles, and search for clues to escape from the Phantom's underground chamber. Will you survive?

🔪 Available on itch.io
https://carebotgames.itch.io/broken-silence

🔪 Our website
http://carebotgames.com/
